  8. class ModeratorOnCommand(NoArgsCommand):
  9. help = 'Turn moderation on, run AFTER setting CMS_MODERATOR = True'

  12. assert settings.CMS_MODERATOR == True, 'Command can only be run if CMS_MODERATOR is True'
